name: claudiajs-apibuilder-aws
description: Deploy Node.js project to AWS Lambda to recover data from a database with user authentication included

scripts.deploy: TMPDIR=/tmp claudia create --profile claudia --role claudia-lambda --name moe-stats --version dev --region eu-west-1 --api-module app --timeout 30 --memory 256 --set-env-from-json config-env.json
scripts.update: TMPDIR=/tmp claudia update --profile claudia --role claudia-lambda --version dev --region eu-west-1 --api-module app --set-env-from-json config-env.json
scripts.release: TMPDIR=/tmp claudia set-version --profile claudia --role claudia-lambda --version production --set-env-from-json config-env.json

author: Daniel Garcia
